module.name: Set CallerID
module.description: Adds the ability to change the CallerID within a call flow.
module.changelog: *15.0.9* Packaging of ver 15.0.9 *15.0.8* FREEPBX-20567 Restoring FreePBX 15 Backup is not restoring CallerID Name and CallerID Number values of Set CallerID entries. *15.0.7* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.6* FREEPBX-20046 *15.0.4* FREEPBX-19418 *15.0.5* FREEPBX-19840 Set CallerID module allows to create duplicate entries with same Description. *15.0.4* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *15.0.3* FREEPBX-19418 *15.0.2.2* fixing legacy restore *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Backup 15
